mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lx_bank_apply(lx_bank_apply_id, lx_bank_apply_count, emp_id, bank_id, dateline_apply, dateline_done) VALUES (#{lx_bank_apply_id}, #{lx_bank_apply_count}, #{emp_id}, #{bank_id}, #{dateline_apply}, #{dateline_done, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE lx_bank_apply SET dateline_done=#{dateline_done}, is_check=#{is_check} WHERE lx_bank_apply_id=#{lx_bank_apply_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*,le.emp_number as emp_number,le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile,le.emp_name as emp_name,le.emp_cover as emp_cover ,lbank.bank_emp_name as bank_emp_name ,lbank.bank_mobile as bank_mobile ,lbank.bank_kaihu_name as bank_kaihu_name ,lbank.bank_name as bank_name ,lbank.bank_card as bank_card from lx_bank_apply sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_bank lbank ON lbank.bank_id = sn.bank_id WHERE sn.lx_bank_apply_id = #{lx_bank_apply_id}
